title: Kuta Beach Essentials (Half-day)
overview: Enjoy Bali's most famous beach with sunbathing, surfing, and vibrant street life.

stops.description: Arrive and relax on the sandy shore, try beginner surfing or swim.
Enjoy refreshments and people-watching at a local café.

title: Classic Kuta Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day at Kuta Beach with surfing lessons, shopping, and sunset views.

stops.description: Take a surfing lesson or swim in the ocean.
Shop for beachwear and enjoy lunch.
Stroll along the beachfront promenade, visit cafés.
Relax and watch the famous Bali sunset.
